import React from "react" import memesData from "../memesData.js" export default function Meme(){ const [meme, setMeme] = React.useState("") function getMemeImage() { const memesArray = memesData.data.memes const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * memesArray.length) setMeme(memesArray[randomNumber].url) } return(
) }
